overview: Dave Ogle's longboard surfing video takes a look at some of the best modern longboard surfing on earth. The powerful Hawaiian surf on the beautiful island of Oahu is where Dave caught up with a few of the top longboard surfers on the planet at play, in their own backyard. World class waves set the stage for some of the most explosive surfing imaginable.  This movie will give you a glimpse into their lives as we search the island for the most challenging waves Mother Nature has to offer. Dave takes a closer look at the most fabled waves on the island as these athletes push the limits, breaking bodies and boards. So sit back and relax and get ready to soak up a little Local Color Hawaiian Style!
title: Local Color: Hawaiian Style
